page.title: 02ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: ENTERTAINMENT THERE ARE MANY FORMS OF ENTERTAINMENT PROVIDED FOR THE PEOPLE OF NORTHWICH. THERE IS A DOUBLE CINEMA,A THEATRE,TWO FOOTBALL CLUBS,A BINGO HALL PLUS A RANGE OF ENTERTAINMENT PROVIDED AT THE MEMORIAL HALL,NORTHWICH'S MAIN FUNCTIONS CENTRE.THE TYPES OF ENTERTAINMENT PROVIDED CATER FOR A WIDE VARIETY OF AGE GROUPS.FOR EXAMPLE CHILDRENS FILMS ARE USUALLY SHOWN DURING THE SCHOOL HOLIDAYS.THERE ARE CERTAIN TYPES OF ENTERTAINMENT IN NORTHWICH WHICH ONLY HAPPEN ONCE A YEAR.THE FAIR COMES TO NORTHWICH ONCE A YEAR,AND OPENS FOLLOWING THE ANNUAL CARNIVAL OF LOCAL FLOATS. EVERY SATURDAY OR MARKET DAY THERE ARE LOCAL ENTERTAINERS TO BE SEEN ENTERTAINING SHOPPERS.THESE INCLUDE ONE-MAN-BANDS,GUITARISTS,AND MORRIS DANCERS.
